title.v: Gửi phiếu lương qua thư điện tử

command.text: declare @$updateDeny nvarchar(512), @$script varchar(64), @$msg nvarchar(512) select @$updateDeny = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Mật khẩu xác nhận không đúng.' else N'Confirmation password is invalid.' end select @$script = 'revertPassword(this, "%s");', @$msg = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Chương trình đã thực hiện xong.' else N'The process was completed successfully.' end

declare @hash varchar(32), @c bit, @d bit, @k varchar(6) exec @@sysDatabaseName..AI_ERP$System$CheckSum @@userID, @$chkpass, 0, @c output if @c = 0 begin select 'cpass' as field, @$updateDeny as message, replace(@$script, '%s', 'cpass') as script return end /*

*/ select stt_rec into #hrsttrec from hrnv where exists(select 1 from @keys where patindex('%'+ stt_rec + '%', text) > 0) if @action = 'Email' begin exec hs_rptPayroll001 @ky, @nam, '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', @ma_nt, @form, @type, @@language, @@userID, @@admin, '@@sysDatabaseName', 2 select '' as field, @$msg as message, 'processComplete(this);' as script, 'ScheduleMail.MailReport.ActiveScheduleMail(@@appDatabaseName, SalaryReportMail)' as invoke end else if @action = 'Cancel' begin delete hrmailbcblct from hrmailbcblct a join #hrsttrec b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec join hrmailbcbl c on a.stt_rec = c.stt_rec and a.ky = c.ky and a.nam = c.nam where a.ky = @ky and a.nam = @nam and c.status in ('1', '2') delete hrmailbcbl from hrmailbcbl a join #hrsttrec b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec where a.ky = @ky and a.nam = @nam and a.status in ('1', '2') select '' as field, @$msg as message, 'processComplete(this);' as script end return
